channel.title: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-
channel.description: Everytime a players gains a level at a theiving stall, there client just freezes? why is this and how can i fix it. 317 server

item.title: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Project Evolution:

Is there any sort of exceptions or errors in your run console?

He beat us both, I wasn’t sure to either write Frame or Interface.

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-

item.title: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

It’s because the level up interface for your thieving is causing your client to freeze. In the mean time, fix it server side by removing it and just creating a sendMessage alter when a player gains a thieving level. I would need more information to help you fix it completely with the correct interface, but if you need it fixed NOW. I suggest you just remove it completely.

EDIT:

Damn you lol, you beat me to it.

Read full topic
item.source: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-

item.title: Urgent issue- client freezes when theiving from a stall-
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The interface that is being used could be crashing the client, I suggest you delete it so it does crash the client, also you should be able to get a different interface for thieving from a list.

Read full topic
